39365162.review: I recommend all Serious Sam games in VR. All of them are just fantastic! Really, just get them all!!!

39359828.review: 拍摄MR视频，画面不能随手柄旋转角度而转动比较遗憾 。不拍 MR视频，游戏视角可以随人物视角改动。希望官方能解决手柄旋转角度，MR视频跟着旋转。这个游戏全部通关，但是拍摄出来的MR效果不是太理想，跟第一部作品最后的希望差距太大。许多敌人都是在自己侧面与背面，观众只能看见我拿着枪在扫射，并看不见敌人。这是非常糟糕的 ，我希望能用手柄旋转角度，让敌人呈现我的正面。让观众更好的欣赏萨姆的怒火。

39242482.review: Great Game! Even more fun than the original release. Great Coop Fun too!

39064556.review: 拿着两把枪突突突正面硬肛的快感~

39064127.review: Some years ago i bought this in non VR  version. And honestly i got bored in level just before pyramid (that big one with spaceship). Now i picked it on sale, and just went past that level. This game in VR is much better than non VR. I am not bored, aiming finding enemies is fun. In dark basements i had few jump scares, but they were caused by my mistakes not some scripted crap. Really nice game. I just stopped playing it because my legs hurt from standing and turning around for 4 hours straight. Also graphics is bit outdated (but still nice), and that is good thing for VR, game runs very smooth, view is clear, i can turn on camera and room view without lagging.

39017027.review: co-op with non vr makes this my future most played game I think. Fantastic feature

38986903.review:
Шикарная игра для погружения в VR. Динамичная и яркая атмосфера, с нормальным игровым балансом.
В игре много разных локаций, особенно понравилось локации с помещаниями где мало света. Там по настоящему испытываешь острые ощущения. 
Управление в игре хорошее, но все же требует доработки. Есть классическое перемещение, которое мне очень нравится.

В общем рекомендую! :)

38942089.review:
I spent most of the time in this game, trying to figure out where to go. I lacked a clear visual point to where I was supposed to go, and there was little to no help from the UI or sound.

Most of my ingame time is spent being idle, because I just took the headset off out of frustration, and went to eat, so it doesn't quite reflect how much time I actually spent ingame, however, the little time I did spend, was not enjoyed.

38795805.review: Pretty much an amazing achievement and a proof that full-blown first person shooters can work perfectly in VR. Good amount of tweakables and options, good performance, no motion sickness and generally it all just comes together so well. Instead of compromise, it's a game that actually feels like a huge leap and improvement over the original non-VR version. Bethesda should take note.

38748212.review: Absolutely great. Started playing. Lost track of time. Put in three hours straight in the Vive. Definitely a must have if you liked the series on the PC. I have all the VR versions of Sam and I liked them all.

38746089.review:
Ich bin äußerst zufrieden mit diesem Spiel. Fesselt es mich doch schon Stunden. Das erste VR Spiel welches mich so lange einzunehmen vermag.
Bewegung (beamen) klappt sehr gut, ich finde es sehr gut spielbar in VR.
Natürlich hätte ich gern eine bessere Auflösung/Bildqualität, aber dass es hiermit dennoch enorm Spaß macht zeigt, es zählen eben auch Inhalte und Spielspaß.
Der Stundenzähler scheint bei mir nicht korrekt anzuzeigen, spiele es schon mehrere Stunden (bin an der Pyamide).
Sehr empfehlenswert für 3D Shooter Fans. Hier sind es nicht so die Horden an Monstern, sondern eher eine Mischkung aus ab und mal Horden (Sam halt) und normalem Shooter.

38732245.review:
best FPS VR experience so far. not yet smooth walking but good enough. often tangled legs with wires 
does feel like good old fps in vr

38691047.review:
Das Spiel lässt auf der Oculus Rift so gut wie nicht spielen.
Es ist nur mit DirectX 11 spielbar und der Oculus API spielbar.
Sämtliche anderen Kombinationen führen bei mir zu abstürzen oder lassen das Spiel auf dem Headset erst gar nicht starten. (DX12, Open GL, etc., hatte alle Kombis durchprobiert)
Unter DX11 muss man öfters damit rechnen das sich das ganze Spiel aufhängt, bin im HMD aufhängt.

Zum Spiel selbst, im Intro war ich mal im Hubschrauber mal am Boden, sehr buggy.
Innengrafiken gefallen mir besser als außen, trotz allem auf Ultra und SS auf 200 % gibt es schönere Spiele (Artika, RoboRecall).

Würde das Spiel fehlerfrei funktionieren, würde ich es vielleicht empfehlen, aber so verbuggt keine Chance.

Finger weg für Oculus Besitzer würd mich mal sagen. Schade.

Mein Setup besteht aus einer 1080 TI mit einem i7 - 4790K und 32 GB RAM. Nichts davon übertaktet oder rumgespielt.
Sonstige VR Games funktionieren einwandfrei auf meinem System.

Werde das Game zurückgeben.

38647391.review: Отвратно нарисованные безликие уровни. Для VR не подходит, долго бродишь враги появляются изредка.

38641904.review: Best vr game not even close.

38638132.review: Très bon jeux pour les amateurs de serious Sam en Vr les sensations sont là malgré les nombreux Bug tout au long de l aventure shoot nerveux et animé pour les fans de la série.

38598609.review:
It's Serious Sam BFE in VR, no strings attached.

Blown away by the purity of the gameplay: no compromises made, just the whole game lovingly transferred into VR with probably the best, most detailed, accessible and easy to navigate options menu out there, which is very important.
There's quicksaving and quickloading that is made arguably even easier in VR than pressing F5 on the keyboard.

Lots of movement options. I'm using full locomotion with smooth turning and not feeling nauseous after long play sessions, even jumping doesn't disorient. Although this varies depending on how you handle VR movement of course.

If you own a headset, get this game. Of the multiple shooters I've played in VR, this one keeps me coming back the most.
You don't feel like Serious Sam here. You ARE Serious Sam.

38597705.review: I have all the Serious Sam VR games now thnks to the sale bundle. This series is some of the best VR fun you an have. The graphics are excellent in all of them and the sheer number of hours of play is unmatched. Oculus Rift and Touch here and the joy of wielding to separate weapons is making me giddy. If you love VR and FPSs you owe it to yourself to grab one of the bundles. I'm all thumbs these days so 10 thumbs up.

38582041.review:
这游戏不要太爽哦。进游戏先把移动改成平移，然后去掉平移的防晕黑影。把语言改成中文（只有情节为中文，设置栏还是英文），把VR分辨率改成最高400%，游戏窗口分辨率不要改。画面明显清晰很多，我1070的显卡也不会卡顿。而且平移增加了紧张度和流畅度。
       玩了1和2小关，第一小关是室外场景，第二小关时室内场景。自己穿梭在战争后的破落小镇中，面对各种英雄萨姆经典的敌人突然出现，好爽。
       3代比1和2代画面提升了好多好多，而且BGM背景音乐也十分好听。
       这么便宜的打折价格还等什么，必入啊。

38550162.review:
Its like Serious Sam was made for VR. 

You have full control of every little option when it comes to graphics.
You have full control of every little option when it comes to movement both in and out of VR.

Dual welding ANY weapon is amazing and really cool. The game is just Serious Sam 3 BFE but in VR... which... automatically makes it better. 

Room scale VR ✓
Seated VR ✓
Great visuals ✓
Great gameplay ✓
Great singleplayer, co-op and multiplayer ✓ 
Flatscreen and VR players can play togheter ✓ 
Moddable ✓

I am recommending this to any FPS fans!

38529613.review:
[h1]Excellent port of an already excellent game![/h1]

Croteam have been doing so well porting their games to VR; all the options you can think of are there. And the price is so low! I loved the pancake version but this is even better. Let's hope we get a VR version of Serious Sam 4 when it's out!

38496045.review:
이번에는 우선 끝까지 클리어 한 후에 작성했습니다.

전작들도 재미있게 했던것 만큼 이번에도 매우 재미있게 했습니다. 학살쾌감에 (거의)리얼한 그래픽까지 가미하니 눈도 무척 즐겁군요.[strike]물론 리얼하게 일어나는 먼지폭풍은 좀...[/strike] 머, 일부 연출이나 움직임이 원작에 비해 어색해진 것도 몇몇 있지만 말이죠.

가장 마음에 드는 건 역시 마지막 스테이지였습니다. 원작에서는 재장전도 거슬리고 대규모 부대를 맞닥들이면 때때로 지긋지긋하다고 느꼈었습니다만, VR버전은 총알이 부족해져가는 극한의 상황을 직접 체험하다보니 오히려 흥미진진해집니다. Easy 모드인데도 샷건탄환마저 부족하다고 느낀건 처음이었습니다. 아, 물론 로켓/C4 보급상자는 논외.
그런데 최종보스전에서 제트팩을 직접 타고 상대하는 것까지 구현한건 의외였습니다. 만약 VR장비 구입한지 얼마 안되서 멀미에 적응하지 못했던 초기였었다면 이 때가 최대의 난관이었을겁니다. 네, 지금은 맘껏 날아다녀도 문제 없습니다.

무기에 대해서 몇가지 말하자면...

일단 대부분 무기에 달려 있는 레이저사이트. 사막 한복판에서는 굉장히 잘 안보입니다. 밝기를 좀 낮추면 되려나...

권총. 생각보다 타격감이 뛰어납니다. 그리고 마구 연사도 할 수 있다보니 초반에는 권총만 들고 설쳐도 충분히 진행할 수 있을 정도입니다. 다만 다른 무기를 쓸 때에 비해서 팔이 상당히 피곤해집니다.

해머. 전기톱을 내놓을 줄 알았는데 그대로 해머를 주더군요. 확실하게 휘둘러줘야 합니다. 주의할 점은 Gnarr는 해머의 사정거리 밖에 딱 걸쳐서 공격하므로 직접 접근하면서 때려줘야 합니다.

C4는 생각보다 꽤나 불편한 무기였습니다. 직접 집어던져야 하는데 원하는데로 던지기가 좀 어렵더군요. 가끔 뒤로 날릴 때도 있어서 곤란합니다.


머, 아무튼간 상당히 만족스러운 게임이었습니다.

남은건 시리어스 샘 2인데....이건 여러모로 곤란할 것 같군요. 게임엔진 문제도 있다곤 했지만, 그 게임의 고유 특징인 "탈 것"을 어떻게 할 건가가 문제이니 말이죠.

38477627.review:
Absolutely loving this game! I found myself playing for multiple hours without even realizing just wanting to see what's next!  The waves of creatures that are sent at you at times seem to bring the action alive just when you need it.  It's not overwhelming either like some games of this nature, especially in VR, but it does force you to keep lookin' and movin'.  
I truly enjoy some of the level design and the use of the full VR surroundings. Sometimes the creatures are on the ceiling or dropping down from the rooftops and at other times they are surrounding the village you are roaming around in while looking for loot.

I would definitely recommend this game especially if you get the bundle deal.  Great value and a well produced game.

P.S. - I had no trouble playing this game sitting or standing in VR, unlike some fps VR titles.

38439533.review:

Graphics are good, runs smooth and lots of fun! This type of game is what VR was made for. Super immersive game!

38071243.review: Croteam is one of the best VR dev teams out there.  Quality releases every time.  Serious Sam 3 plays excellent and looks excellent.  Lots of fun.  Thanks Croteam!

38063015.review: This is must buy for VR! Trust me. I played 10+ VR Fps and SS is one of the best..if not the best.

38061269.review:
It's amazing how much technology has progressed. Played that back in the day on flat screen, now it's available in VR. And what a glorious VR that is. You're there, in Cairo with its atmospheric blend of ancient and new, and can look all those monsters in the face! Too bad you cannot punch them in the face like in the good old days, but the good old sledgehammer will do nicely.

The gameplay is buttery smooth on an i5 3570k and gtx 1070. No stuttering whatsoever. The combat is as good as back in the day, maybe even better with the inclusion of dual wielding. Sam's gritty'n'witty as ever and the monsters are even more hideous and gruesome which VR emphasises tenfold. And with a plethora of locomotion options, everyone can enjoy one of the best VR games available to us at the moment.

If you liked Serious Sam back then, you simply have to buy the complete bundle (with talos principle). If you are new to the franchise, you're in for a fluid combat shooter treat. Highly recommended.

The Serious Sam games aren't excatly my cup of tea, but it's really fun in VR.

This is a VR must buy!

37786198.review:
Fell from helicopter and landed on the roof.
Dusting myself off, admiring the view, never seen graphics this
good in VR before, go to look over the edge when a monster scares the wits out of me.
Heart rate now definitely higher than what it says in the HUD.

Can't figure out how to get off the roof. 
Vaguely remember having same trouble in the non-VR version.
Wander around and find a curiously light sledgehammer.
Hmm... remember this used to come in handy. 
Still wondering how to get off the roof.

Try pressing all the possible Vive controller buttons... Still nothing.
Squeeze the grip button and find myself falling off the roof from the highest point. Ooof!

Check... Still alive? Yes. Yay! 
Fright of my life as huge creature lurches at me.
Holy (expletive deleted)!
Frantically clobber it with sledgehammer.
Wipe the blood splatter off...

Still alive... Yay!
But at this heart rate, maybe not for long...
Press button to select pistols instead of sledgehammer.
Hear some growling behind me, shoot wildly...
The creature sneaking up on me is even uglier than the first one.
Any wounds? Seems not... Still alive. Yay!
More growling, gotta go investigate...
Guess I'll just have to get used to this level of heart rate.

Works fine on the AMD GV-RX480G1 card that came with the Vive.

37736576.review: Much better than every VR FPS existing.

37358757.review: C'est quoi ce jeu de malade en VR!C'est une pure merveille en plus hyper jouissif, on s'y croit a 200 pour 100.

37314556.review: Старый добрый сэм, полностью переведённый в VR. Выглядит здорово и ощущается совсем по-другому. Теперь от орды камикадзе ты действительно паникуешь.

37253420.review:
I bought the Croteam bundle, it's well worth it if you want a bunch of the best quality VR shooters availale.  Talos Principle is in there too but I haven't played it yet.  The Last Hope is a stand in one spot and shoot whetever stands in front of you style shooter.  Unfortunately it seems like that's the most common type of VR shooter.  Probably because there's far less chance of getting sick if you're not spinning around and they'er quick and easy to develope.
So far the best VR shooter for me has been Farpoint for the PSVR.  The locomotion mechanics of that game are the most satisfying I've experienced yet.  Serious Sam 3 VR is exactly the same as the original game, except it's been modified to work well with VR.  It's actually a heck of a lot of fun.
By default you're transporting around like you do in most other VR games where you have to walk around to travel.  But what's nice is you can change it so you can use the analog sticks to walk around like you would with a standard controller.  It is nice, but it does sometimes seem to stutter a little bit.  I have a 5.1 GHz 7700K, 32 GB of 3466 MHz DDR4, SLI GTX 1080 Ti's OC'd to 2160 MHz/11.3 GHz, 960 Evo SSD, Rift running via HDMI and USB 3.1, two sensors running USB 3.0 and another one running USB 2.0.  I have the settings turned all the way up and it runs pretty good.  I'm running single GPU atm, I will try SLI and edit my review if it works.  But you still get occassional stuttering, but only really when you're turning.  Which is why I changed the controls so I can still walk around but the turn it's, uh, not sure what to call it.  Jumping like 45* in whichever direction you choose like it does on similar VR games.  Since when you turn around with your physical body it changes the direction your character is facing I am able to combine the two methods of turning to allow me to play without it feeling too harsh.  I have been into 3D for quite a few years so I was immediately able to adapt to VR.  It takes a lot to give me motion sickness.  So I can play it well enough, but it's not comfortable 100% of the time.
The graphics are really good if you have the system to run the game at very high levels of anti alisaing, super sampling or resolution scaling.  The audio is pretty good, same as the oringal game.  You can hold a gun in both hands and there's a laser from each to tell you where you're aiming.
In the end I wouldn't say it's as smooth as Farpoint regarding locomotion.  But to be fair, Farpoint is bascially designed around not letting you spin completely around, they designed the game to keep your facing forward as often as possible since the PS4 has no rear tracking.  But the gun you get with that game is epic.  I would love to have one for games with my Rift.  I saw Vive has one, but don't know anything about it.
Basically I definitely recommend this game if you're into shooters and you have a VR headset.  It very well may be the best first person shooter available on the PC at this moment.  I'm sure Doom will crush it soon enough.

EDIT:
SLI does work.  It works extremely well and scaling is really good.  Although, I can't imagine the GPU that could max out all this games settings and run this game flawlessly.  It probably won't exist for another 5 years. I mean 4x SSAA+8xMSAA and 400% Resolution Scaling.  I can run the game pretty reliably with all other settings maxed at 150% Res. Scaling

37212905.review:
Very recommended, especially for people that like over the top old school arcade FPS with locomotion.

I started playing the flat screen version a while ago, then forgot about it.
So I didn't expect to be hooked that much by the VR port. Just finished the campaign on normal difficulty (11h) and there is still a lot to do.

Great work on the port, as expected from Croteam.
The gameplay works perfectly. I use smooth trackpad locomotion with touch-to-move relative to controller orientation.
Some scenes and ambiances gains a lot from VR. Combats are also more visceral.
Sometimes the assets show their age, and are a bit too much recycled, but level design makes up for it.
Overall the pacing is great, it's hard to stop playing (want to see what's next).

The only thing that could be improved (except making Serious Sam 4 VR), is that cutscenes camera switch too much. Maybe I missed an option or something, didn't look for it as it's a very minor problem.

Edit: I cannot stop listening to the OST (DLC for flat screen version). Fight versions are great on Audioshield Elite.

36684100.review:
This is a serious master piece! I bought all Serious Sams right on release and enjoyed them so much that I also bought the re-releases: HD and VR. However the VR version tops it all! It is absolutely amazing playing Serious Sam while beeing in his world! SS3 is the technologically most advanced installation and this definitively plays out very well in VR. Although it offers a lot of options to tailor the VR experience to your likings, I enjoy the traditional movement (into the direction you point the Vive controller at) the most: you can move like in the old days of flat gaming but you get a feeling of really beeing there and shooting the alien scum feels so extremely good in VR. Of course everything else stays the same: the same good humor, nice level design, good variation in different enemies and attack patterns. It is simply a very well made game and I'm very happy that Croteam ported it to VR!

P.S.: My playtime is not accurate since I played SS3VR mainly in Fusion and just downloaded SS3VR-standalone to be able to give a review!

36680676.review: First off id like to say holy motherloving sh%$ this game is bad a$@. The graphics are great, tons of fun, movement is top notch, and im sure itll be fixed soon but the only trouble i had was multiplayer and the audio with multiplayer which i know not everyone experienced but itll be fixed soon. Cant say enough good things about it. Go croteam!!!!!! My brother told me to buy this and just like last hope im so not dissapointed and glad i did!!!!!!

36640980.review: If you want to lay waste to hoards of larger than life mobs this game is for you.  One thing I like about the SS games is you can actually clear an area, so you don't have to keep looking behind you after every corner like some games.

36632336.review:
Got this game the other day, thought I'd jump in for a minute and see how it is. One hour later, I stop to take a breath, great game, great VR implementation! 

Get it NOW!

36591868.review:
I never got into serious sam on PC before but I picked it up again on VR primarily to promote Croteam. I was plesantly supriseed though it is actually much better in VR. You really need to play on Hard or above though otherwise you don't get enough enemies, but far I've found it pretty enjoyable. 

Pistol in one had shotty in the other just makes mowing down enemies a breeze and the telepot system really lets you move around fast wiht out any motion sickness.

Would recommend.

36558598.review: This game is fun in VR. If you have the stomach to turn off all of the comfort settings, this is a very fast paced run and gun experience. Linear story, killing along the way between arena areas where you fight mass groups, get to kill a boss, go to the next level. As in, a game, not another “experience.” Be warned, this will put some use into those trigger buttons.

36557928.review:
My fav. VR game to date. Once you get past the first couple of levels it just keeps getting better and better. Looking forward to some co-op play.

Worth the money, lots of fun to be had. Fast and intense so know your VR legs and choose the right settings!

36556480.review:

Keep going croteam.......the vr decisions youve been making are def the right ones

36554311.review: Шикрный Сем , лучший из серии , к покупке обязателен !

36550421.review:
Гра дуже сподобалася. Колись у 2011 придбав її, але так і не пройшов докінця - бракувало часу.
Із ВР версією - гра набула нових вражень. По перше це славнозвістна шалена швидкість бою, при тому що монстрюгі великі вискакують перед очима - це дійсно вражає, набагато більше ніж навіть на великому моніторі.
По друге - дуже гнучке налаштування ВР контролерів та гри. Наприклад можливо - телепорт, або класичне пересування ввімкнути. Графіка як для ВР дуже і дуже приємна. Та дотого ж масса налаштувань під різні системи і залізо.
Прицілювання та постріли зроблені непогано і відчуваються справжніми.
Але нажаль об'ємний звук троки не налаштований - наприклад складно зрозуміти звідки біжить камікадзе - ааааа
Технічних проблем за час гри не було взагалі.

36548233.review:
Serious Sam in Höchstform.
Ja, es ist nur ein Shooter, aber einer, der vieles richtig macht.
Wie von Sam gewohnt gibt es Gegnermassen, flotte Sprüche und dicke Wummen (Double the gun, double the fun)
Wer Teil 1 und 2 mag, wird auch den dritten mögen.
Grafisch hebt sich der Teil nochmal deutlich von seinen Vorgängern ab.
Anstatt nur Pyramiden und Ägypten gibt es diesmal eine komplette Stadt zu erkunden, in der wie immer jede menge Munition, Waffen und Secrets verteilt sind.
Auch den Coop/Multiplayer haben sie mittlerweile im Griff, also kann man mit bis zu 16 Leuten auf Alienjagd gehen, schon in den Vorgängern ein dickes Plus.
Das Spiel läuft trotz der ansehnlichen Grafik flüssig (GTX 970)
Die Steuerungsoptionen sind gut durchdacht (Teleport, freies Laufen, Komfortmodus etc, es bleiben keine Wünsche offen)
Alles in allem ein solides Spiel, wer die Möglichkeit hat, sollte es reduziert im Bundle kaufen, da der Preis doch etwas höher ist. 

Für mich gehört Sam definitiv zu den besseren VR-Spielen und ist eine klare Kaufempfehlung für alle Shooter(und Sam)-Fans

Gruß Ziffi

Ziffi als Kurator: http://store.steampowered.com/curator/5837414/

36542447.review: Movement controls work very well, best VR shooter I've played yet!

36542222.review: es lo mejor que e jugado en realidad virtual maravillozo

36540607.review: Once you get the controls down it's very fast paced and engaging. I'd say it plays better at higher difficulties as you have to dodge more and have more incentive to look for secrets for ammo armor and hp.

36539962.review:
The BEST GAME i have played in ages!

36521311.review: Probablement ce qui se fait de mieux en FPS VR à l'heure actuelle. Aussi péchu que le 1 et le 2, avec de superbes graphismes. Je conseille donc quelque chose de bien costaud niveau hardware pour en profiter au maximum, si comme moi vous aimez courir et sauter partout à pleine vitesse.

36518840.review: Has to be the best VR game i have played to date. Simple run and gun action with a ungodly amount of  enemies pouring down at you. 36517941.review: Brilliant game. Say what you want about it being an old game, but the port is one of the best out there. Plenry of locomotion options, use a kb + m or controller if you want, loads of comfort options, crossplay with pancake players and great optimisation. Thanks Croteam!

36517387.review: Can't believe I'm actually in serious sam 3 the game. Great grapics and immersion. You may get a little quezzy at times with al the quick dashes while looking around to shoot, but it is an awesome experience.

36507576.review:
Finally! This is what i waited for! I didn't like the previous ones due to their high price and old graphics,  or being a wave shooter. This time i feel different! There are many options to tailor the game for yourself. Big thanx for the weapon scale option, for me it makes a hugh difference scaling them down to real life size!!! If you are running a secret goverment agency and have access to supercomputers, you can even choose 400% resolution...   Does it worth the price? Yes! I haven't played SS3, only the demo, so for me playing it the first time in vr is a new experience, and those, who did, they get a discount...
My only problem is the prveiously mentioned coop lag, but i read the patch is coming, so no worries. 
I love the game, thanx!

36486894.review: its BFE but in a well done VR. only sticky point is you might have to try flicking your wrist several times to get the c4 to stick properly. Other then that, if you liked serious sam 3, or doom, or any of those old school fast pace games then youll like this.

36483208.review:
比我想像中好很多
遊戲節奏很快也很刺激
畫面的畫質在VIVE頭盔裡看起來還不錯
有故事情節也支援部分的中文翻譯
可以選擇投射的方式前進
或是用步行的方式
很符合不同玩家的需求
山姆系列的遊戲

36475907.review: SERIOSLY best VR game out there!

36474555.review:
A top quality VR title. It has all the locomotion and graphics options that anyone could hope for. It supports both SteamVR and Oculus SDK. It can be played in multiplayer with players on monitors and most importantly it is a full game, not some cut down 'experience' that some devs try to call games, so you get all the Serious goodness you have come to know and love from a Sam game.

All in all, a must buy for VR gamers and a lesson in how to make a VR game for other devs.

Totally recommended.

36473074.review: The best one yet in my opinion. So much fun, and so stunning visually. I just stood around saying "Whoa!" so many times and I'm just getting started on the game. It is so amazing to see these familiar levels in VR. I know Croteam is a little down on VR right now due to ROI, but I promise there are loyal VR gamers out there who are spreading the gospel.  Don't give up on us. You folks are doing so many things right; providing so many options for locomotion and gameplay.  Thank you.

36465040.review:
做為系列作第三代  整套收藏價格只要NT272	很便宜索性就買了
目前只有1-2關卡的體驗~~

VR優化方面明顯比前兩代成熟許多  畫質雖然還是以前的風格 但是3代算比較近期的作品 模組上有明顯細緻很多
(雖然噴血還是假假的)  預設的高速移動 和 跳躍 都類似順移取代 靠近牆壁也有推開防偷看的效果 
算是做了好幾版SAM VR的優點集大成  無論UI設置 還有劇情字幕的呈現
(連讀石板 目光對道才會出現解讀出的字幕這點小細節) 都有用心
而且這一代導入劇情 不再是之前漫無目的的探索神廟  過廠動畫也比起其他代有用心很多 算的是VR大作


這代風格跟前幾代稍微有點不同 
 這代多了些探索與恐怖要素~以前幾代都是開槍打怪物海的爽GAME 這代海量有明顯減少 但是怪物分布會在出奇不易的地方, 怪物忽然的飛撲和轉角衝臉這代有明顯變多   遊戲一開始是在廢墟城市探索 所以會有點BIO5 還是Half-life 的感覺
(雖然路線上還是偏線性的 但是感覺場景蠻大的很多東西可以探索)

可以在fallout 4 出來前體驗一下廢墟冒險的感覺!
有收藏系列作的玩家可以入手畢竟有收藏的化入包非常便宜!

36461331.review: Once you get past the first 2-3 levels the game is amazing. The first few levels are a little meh, but man was this amazing in VR. And the locomotion options are incredible. Other VR devs please take note of this. The only issue is the movement speed is a little fast for VR imo, but not much you can do about that since the game was converted and it needs to be that fast to dodge enemies. It's very fun!

36455980.review: Another great game, the space monkeys are evil little bastards though!!!

36455388.review:
I don't have words for this experience.....but this game is the best shooter ever !! with the VR and the destructive power of weapons you never felt so much violence in a shoot m up. Totally  insane !

Everything is very good in this game, it's mind blowing. I mean everything !

And it proves that fast doom-like are completly  playable in VR with the controllers. It's a total blast.
Jeez, Croteam VR catalog is the best. I don't regret to have the complete collection, we are far away from prototype games never ending EA, trash or 1 hour experience billed 20. Thank you and Gj devs.

36451923.review:
Only got cash for one Serious Sam VR game? Get this one.
But get the whole bundle if you can afford it, you won't regret.

[i](The following counts for all Serious Sam VR games)[/i]
Plenty of options like teleporting/smooth movement, orientation (head, controller or room),  render scale and advanced graphic options. 
Switch between SteamVR and Oculus runtimes.
Includes online multiplayer with the pancake version.
Comes with Serious Sam Fusion so you have them all in one place.

36449612.review:
Der arcadige, hecktische Shooter-Klassiker funktioniert auch ganz gut unter ner 3D Brille. Genug Raum vorausgesetzt.

First Impression Video: https://youtu.be/yne01qIvMu8

Pro:
- das komplette Serious Sam 3 1:1 in VR umgesetzt
- sehr hoher (gefühlter) coolness-Faktor beim Spielen
- umfangreiche Optionen um es auf (fast) allen PC's laufen zu lassen

Contra:
- benötigt viel Platz zum optimalen Spielen
- 45° Drehung per Stick zu langsam um Gegner hinter sich schnell zu erreichen (wenn man aus Platzgründen nur Frontal spielen kann! Roomscale ohne Probleme!)
- für VR-Neulinge schwere Kost für Kopf und Magen

36448677.review:
[Don't worry about the low playtimes for reviewers on this game. Pretty much everyone plays the SS3 levels through the 'Serious Sam Fusion' software-hub since that lets VR players do multiplayer with 'flat' players. I personally *only* installed SS3 'itself' just to let it run for a bit so I could throw up this review. I've played about 4 hours of SS3 through Fusion so far.]

This game is all kinds of fantastic in VR- tons of graphics and locomotion options to allow anyone to play- and of course gameplay I've had a *crazy* amount of fun with.

SS1 and SS2 VR were excellent games, but I'm *really* digging the more complex levels and enviornments I'm seeing in this game so far.

This game is must-have for anyone looking to add more high quality 'full' games to their library.

36447567.review: Awesome game!  Has a ton of VR specific options so that you can tailor the controls exactly how you like them.  Great level design with great looking graphics.  Excellent and well worth the price!

36447355.review: Serious Sam action you love in VR now with shiny graphics. A+

36434221.review: Vive: This is like the first two (fast, intense fun) but with Last Hope level graphics and, maybe, fewer enemies but more exploration and story. I'm playing it on hard, and it isn't hard so far at 2.5 hours in. I have an i7 3770k and 1080 Ti, and I was getting some judder on ultra and high graphics settings, but the judder went away with everything on medium. I had the same issue with The Talos Principle. It's probably the same game engine. I keep Steam VR SS at 2.0 and don't SS within games.

Very, very fun and awesome VR game!  It's the entire Serious Sam 3 campaign plus all the other modes that the flat screen version has!  Only thing missing at the moment is the DLC Jewel of the Nile.  You can play with both VR and flat screen players on-line using Serious Sam Fusion 2017!  Lots of intense action!

One of the best VR games out there today!   Highly recommended!
Rock on Croteam!!  Great times!!

36424148.review: This game is absolutely incredible. If you thought the original version of the game was good then this will blow your mind. I'd go so far as to say this game is the best VR FPS to date.

36421613.review:
シリアスサム３のボリュームのあるキャンペーンがVRでプレイできます。
気になる移動関係のオプションは自由移動から回転、ワープや酔い軽減の視界まで、
様々な設定が完備されていますので、自分の好きな設定で遊ぶことが出来ます。
現時点でストーリー等の主要な部分は日本語化されております。
オプション設定は英語ですが、翻訳ボランティアをさせていただきましたので、
そのうち日本語化されると思います…たぶん。

ところで、このゲームを買うとSerious Sam Fusionという、
シリアスサム１・２・３を共通のゲームエンジンで動かせるランチャーが付いてきまして、
オプション設定を共通化したり、ネット対戦のサーバーリストが１～３まで全部列挙され、
非VR版の人とも対戦や協力プレイが出来たり、
SteamWorkshopで簡単にMODを導入できたり、グラフィックも綺麗だったりと、
何かと便利なのでみなさんそちらで遊んでいるようです。

そこがちょっとSteamのレビューとプレイ時間表示のシステムと相性が悪くて、
このページではものすごくレビューの数やプレイ時間が少なく見えますが、
実際のプレイに関しての情報を見たい場合は Serious Sam Fusion で
検索していただいた方を見た方がいいかもしれません。

36407935.review:
I loved the original Serious Sam 3 BFE and the VR version is so great!

36406449.review: I love how you can join in coop mode with non-VR players.   It would be nice if other studios would do the same with classic titles.

36406319.review:
Serious Sam 3 VR: BFE besitze ich schon länger in der nicht VR Version und mochte es nicht so gerne wie die anderen Serious Sam Spiele. In VR ist mein Eindruck von SS 3: BFE hingegen sehr gut. Die realistischere Grafik als in den anderen  SS Teilen, steigert die Immersion doch enorm und macht diesen Titel zu einem Pflichtkauf, wenn man mit den anderen Serious Sam Spielen auch seine Freude hatte. 
Ich bin erneut begeistert von der Optiosvielfalt, die einem das Croteam hier wieder bietet. Die VR Portierung des Originals ist wiedereinmal hervorragend gelungen. Vielen lieben Dank dafür! 
Es ist schon herrlich mit dem Hammer wirklich zuschlagen zu können, statt einfach nur einen Knopf zu drücken ;-)
Ich vergebe eine klare Kaufempfehlung für alle VR Shooter Freunde (und solche, die es werden wollen). Unterstützt bitte diese tollen Entwickler, damit wir auch Serious Sam 4 in VR erleben dürfen!

Punkte: 9/10

36406089.review:
Serious Sam 3 VR: BFE is amazing.

Even though I love Serious Sam First Encounter and Second Encounter in VR, and feel that The Last Hope is an excellent rail shooter, I still felt that Doom 3 BFG VR was the crown jewel of the first person shooter VR experience.

After my first hours with SS3 VR, I think it's possibly been dethroned.

SS3 is polished and different and has a (slightly) more methodical play style. It's still about mowing down hordes of interesting (though prdictable) arcade-style baddies, usually in corridors and arenas, though here the environments are sometimes a bit more complex.

It's the crown jewel in the crown of SS Fusion. I intended to write a positive SS3 review on the SS3 VR store page, but silly Steam doesn't know that I've played it since I play it in Fusion. Might have to leave the non-Fusion variant of the game running just to get a positive review up there.

Long story short: same genre, plays a bit different, if anything higher quality. Don't miss it. Fantastic fun in VR.

36405925.review: The final SS VR conversion in the collection and the tightest experience yet.  Croteam have lead the way in VR gaming with the customisablity and option tweaking to get the game performing to your own needs.  The games kickass, graphics are grand, and you can duel wield giant hammers to pulverise the alien menace back into space.  S'all good stuff yo.

36405798.review:
I've only played through the 1st level and already loving it. 
Thanks Croteam for all the great VR games!
